datarestored: Previously stored data successfully retrieved. Yay!
greyuser: Only bouncers and up can run a bot. Ask an admin for help.
bouncer: The bot can't move people when it's run as a bouncer. Contact an admin.
songknown: @%%NAME%%, your song is in the room history. Try another song. :) Skipping..
timelimit: @%%NAME%%, your song is longer than %%MAXLENGTH%% minutes, you need permission to play longer songs. The max song length is %%MAXLENGTH%%.
permissionownsong: :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isblacklisted: This track is on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! Skipping...
isopen: /me The roulette is now open! Type !join to participate! Good Luck!
winnerpicked: /me A winner has been picked! @%%NAME%% to position %%POSITION%%. Well done! :D
ghosting: @%%NAME1%% %%NAME2%% is either ghosting or not here.
alreadyadding: User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: Added @%%NAME%% to the queue. Current Position: %%POSITION%%.
usernotfound: User not found! Did you type it right?
notdisconnected: @%%NAME%% did not disconnect during my time here. :/ How awkward.
noposition: No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: @%%NAME%%'s last disconnect (DC or leave) was too long ago: %%TIME%%.
valid: @%%NAME%% disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at around position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: @%%NAME%%, you have not been chatting for %%TIME%%, Please talk in chat or you will be removed.
warning2: @%%NAME%%, have not been chatting. Please talk in chat or you will be removed.
afkremove: @%%NAME%%, you have been removed for being inactive in chat. You were at position %%POSITION%%. Chat at least once every %%MAXIMUMAFK%% minutes if you want to play a song.
spam: @%%NAME%%, please don't spam. It creates vortexes in this Plug DJ Room! =O
roomadvertising: @%%NAME%%, don't post links to other rooms please. You may get banned!
adfly: @%%NAME%%, please change your autowoot program. We suggest RCS: https://rcs.radiant.dj/
invalidgiftags: @%%NAME%% Invalid tags, try something different. Tags: %%TAGS%%
nolistspecified: @%%NAME%% No list specified. Oh No! Please try again. <3
invalidlistspecified: @%%NAME%% Invalid list specified. Contact an admin if you think this is an error.
novaliduserspecified: @%%NAME%% No valid user specified. Check it again.
whois: @%%NAME1%% Username: %%NAME2%%, ID: %%ID%%, Rank: %%RANK%%, Joined: %%JOINED%%, Level: %%LEVEL%%, Language: %%LANGUAGE%%, Avatar: %%AVATAR%%, Status: %%STATUS%%%%PROFILE%%
newblacklisted: @%%NAME%% This track belongs on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! [ %%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%% - %%MID%% ]
voteskiplimit: @%%NAME%% Voteskip limit is currently set to %%LIMIT%% mehs.
voteskipexceededlimit: @%%NAME%%, your song has exceeded the voteskip limit (%%LIMIT%% mehs). Skipping...
voteskipinvalidlimit: @%%NAME%% Invalid voteskip limit, please try again using a number to signify the number of mehs.
activeusersintime: @%%NAME%% There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: @%%NAME%% Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
autowoot: We recommend RCS for autowooting and much more: https://rcs.radiant.dj/
brandambassador: /me A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: https://plug.dj/ba
bouncerplusrank: /me @%%NAME%% You have to be manager or up to enable Bouncer+. Contact an Smash Admin!
eatcookie: /me Eats a cookie. Nom, Nom. MY COOKIE. :D
nousercookie: /em doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats a cookie himself.
selfcookie: @%%NAME%%, you're a bit greedy, aren't you? Giving cookies to yourself, bah. Share some with other people! Spread the <3
cycleguardtime: @%%NAME%% The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: @%%NAME%% Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, you are not on the waitlist.
eta: @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%.
roulettejoin: /me @%%NAME%% joined the roulette! (!leave if you regret it.)
jointime: @%%NAMEFROM%% @%%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: @%%NAME%% you can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from the community for %%TIME%% minutes by %%NAME%%.
kill: /me @everyone I'm off for my sleep. Bye!
lockskippos: @%%NAME%% Lockskip will now move the dj to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: @%%NAME%% The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: [@%%NAME%% The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: @%%NAME%%, don't try to add me to the waitlist, please. k, thx bb <3
mutedmaxtime: @%%NAME%% You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
muterank: @%%NAME%% You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
removenotinwl: @%%NAME%% Specified user @%%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: /me Please follow the rules which can be found here: %%LINK%%
sessionstats: @%%NAME%% Total woots: %%WOOTS%%, total mehs: %%MEHS%%, total grabs: %%GRABS%%.
skip: /me %%NAME%% used skip to skip the current DJ.
madeby: /me I was created by Yemasthui and modified by Choccat.
swapinvalid: @%%NAME%% Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!) Try Again!
swapwlonly: @%%NAME%% Please only swap users that are in the waitlist!
genres: We accept most genres. Check the rules here: http://smashroyale.com/forums/index.php?threads/plugdj-rules.499/
unmuteeveryonerank: @%%NAME%% Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once. Try contacting an admin.
unmuterank: @%%NAME%% You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: @%%NAME%% The cooldown for commands by users is now set to %%TIME%% seconds.
purchase: @%%NAME%% Subscribe to Plug DJ at: https://plug.dj/subscribe/
